page.title: 13Life of a Helicopter Pilot
page.content: {Paul Evans,}an aimiable 25 year old from Eastbourne, is a pilot with Bristows Helicopters in the North Sea Operations Area. His normal working day begins early as he has to report in at least 1 hour before the usual departure time of 0700 hours. This check-in time is vital as during it Paul has to consider a number of "Operational Criteria" such as Destination, Weather, etc., which allows him to compute the weight of fuel he is likely to need. This then allows him to calculate the "payload" available to the Company chartering the craft - number of men, luggage and so on.
